item.title: 人工智能工具推动广告支出，Pinterest 营收超预期
item.description: 周四，Pinterest 的第二季度营收超过了分析师的预期，原因是人工智能广告工具推动了该平台营销支出的增长。【原文：Pinterest beat analysts' estimates for second-quarter revenue on Thursday, as increased marketing spend on the platform was fueled by its artificial intelligence-powered advertising tools.】

item.title: 吉利德公司季度利润持平，上调全年业绩展望
item.description: 吉利德科学公司（Gilead Sciences）周四公布的季度财报显示，该公司季度盈利持平，收入略有增长，但上调了全年财务展望，主要原因是艾滋病药物的销售好于预期。【原文：Gilead Sciences on Thursday reported flat quarterly earnings on slightly higher revenue and raised its full-year financial outlook due largely to better-than-expected sales of HIV drugs.】

item.title: 赌徒连胜结束，FanDuel 所有者上调盈利预期
item.description: FanDuel 的所有者 Flutter 周四上调了全年利润增长预期，此前美国赌客长达六个月的连胜势头在好于预期的第二季度急转直下，转而有利于博彩公司。【原文：FanDuel-owner Flutter raised its forecast for full-year profit growth on Thursday after a six-month-long winning streak for U.S. gamblers swung sharply back in the favour of bookmakers during a better-than-expected second quarter.】

item.title: 美国石油生产商 EOG 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 美国能源生产商 EOG Resources 周四公布的第二季度利润超出预期，原因是产量的增长帮助该公司抵消了原油价格的下跌。【原文：EOG Resources beat estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, as a rise in output helped the U.S. energy producer offset a drop in crude oil prices.】

item.title: 演唱会需求火爆，Live Nation 收入超出预期
item.description: 受演唱会需求强劲的推动，Ticketmaster 母公司 Live Nation Entertainment 周四公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Ticketmaster-parent Live Nation Entertainment beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by strong demand for concerts.】

item.title: 美国旅游需求复苏，Expedia 季度利润上升
item.description: Expedia 周四报告称，受美国需求复苏的帮助，该公司第二季度利润增长，使得这家在线旅游公司的股价在盘后交易中上涨了 12%。【原文：Expedia reported a rise in its second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by a recovery of demand in the United States, sending the online travel company's shares up 12% in extended trade.】

item.title: 消费者支出回暖，百佳超市上调年度盈利预期，股价大涨
item.description: 周四，布洛克公司报告第二季度收入增长，并上调了对全年毛利润的预期，这家支付公司受到了消费者支出恢复性增长的帮助，股价在延时交易中上涨了 12%。【原文：Block reported a rise in second-quarter income and raised its expectations for annual gross profit on Thursday, as the payments firm was helped by resilient consumer spending, lifting its shares 12% higher in extended trading.】

item.title: 特朗普签署针对银行歧视申诉的命令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，针对银行的歧视性做法。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday that targeted banks over what his administration says are discriminatory practices.】

item.title: 因网络安全需求，Akamai上调年度业绩预期
item.description: Akamai Technologies周四上调了年度收入和利润预期，这主要得益于对其云基础设施服务和内容分发网络产品的稳定需求。【原文：Akamai Technologies raised its annual revenue and profit forecast on Thursday, helped by steady demand for its cloud infrastructure services and content delivery network offerings.】

item.title: 据《美国汽车新闻》报道，福特将电动皮卡和厢式货车的生产推迟到 2028 年
item.description: 美国《汽车新闻》周四援引知情人士的话报道称，福特汽车正在推迟推出两款下一代电动汽车，因为该公司正将重点转向更小、更经济实惠的车型。【原文：Ford Motor is delaying the launch of two next-generation electric vehicles as it shifts focus to smaller and more affordable models, Automotive News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普提名米兰临时担任美联储理事
item.description: 特朗普表示，米兰的任期将持续到 2026 年 1 月 31 日，同时他将继续寻找永久继任者。【原文：Trump said Miran will serve in the role until January 31, 2026, while he continues a search for a permanent replacement.】

item.title: 由于国内供应量低迷，美国 7 月原油出口量创四年新低
item.description: 由于国内供应量低，以及亚洲和欧洲买家找到了更便宜的替代品，美国原油出口在7月份降至近四年来的最低水平，这削弱了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推动更多外国购买美国能源供应的努力。【原文：U.S. crude oil exports eased in July to the lowest levels in nearly four years on low domestic supplies and as Asian and European buyers found cheaper alternatives, undermining U.S. President Donald Trump's push for more foreign countries to purchase U.S. energy supplies.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，白宫准备提名斯蒂芬-米兰为美联储理事
item.description: 据彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道，白宫正准备让美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名经济顾问委员会主席斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）担任美联储理事。【原文：The White House is preparing for U.S. President Donald Trump to nominate Council of Economic Advisers Chairman Stephen Miran to serve as a Federal Reserve governor, Bloomberg reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar.】

item.title: 投资者博弈市场对美联储主席更换人选的反应
item.description: 随着特朗普总统缩小下一任美联储主席的候选名单，投资者和策略师正在密切分析市场对每一位准备在鲍威尔任期结束后接替他的潜在提名人可能作出的一系列反应。【原文：As President Trump narrows his shortlist for the next Federal Reserve chair, investors and strategists are closely analyzing the range of possible market reactions to each potential nominee poised to replace Jerome Powell when his term is over.】

item.title: Vanguard 就共同基金税费虚高诉讼达成和解
item.description: 联邦法官驳回了 Vanguard Group 此前达成的和解协议，该诉讼指控这家共同基金巨头让其广受欢迎的目标日期基金的投资者承担了高额税费。【原文：Vanguard Group settled a lawsuit accusing the mutual fund giant of saddling investors in its popular target-date funds with inflated tax bills, after a federal judge rejected an earlier settlement.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，必和必拓与淡水河谷就巴西大坝灾难的英国诉讼达成 14 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，全球矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和淡水河谷公司（Vale）已出价约 14 亿美元，以解决在英国发生的一起与巴西有史以来最严重的环境灾难之一有关的集体诉讼。【原文：Global miners BHP Group and Vale have offered around $1.4 billion to settle a class action lawsuit in the United Kingdom tied to one of Brazil's worst-ever environmental disasters, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 博斯蒂克劳动力市场风险上升，但 9 月会议前仍需大量数据
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周四表示，就业市场面临的风险已经增加，但在美国联邦储备委员会下次会议之前承诺降息仍然为时过早，因为关键数据尚未出炉，而且预计未来几个月通胀率仍将上升。【原文：Risks to the job market have increased, but it remains too soon to commit to interest rate cuts before the next meeting of the U.S. Federal Reserve with key data still to come and inflation still expected to rise in coming months, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国联邦法院称其系统成为 "近期升级的网络攻击 "的目标
item.description: 联邦司法机构在周四的一份声明中说，其 IT 系统受到了 "最近升级的、复杂的、持续性的网络攻击"。【原文：The federal judiciary said in a statement Thursday that its IT systems have been targeted by "recent escalated cyberattacks of a sophisticated and persistent nature."】

item.title: 芯科最大股东将投票反对出售给 CoreWeave
item.description: Core Scientific 的最大股东 Two Seas Capital 周四发表公开信，表示将投票反对将公司出售给 CoreWeave 的提议。【原文：Two Seas Capital, the largest shareholder of Core Scientific , issued an open letter on Thursday saying it would vote against the company's proposed sale to CoreWeave .】

item.title: 巴西汽车出口受阿根廷推动将大幅增长；关税影响当地销量
item.description: 巴西汽车制造商协会 Anfavea 周四表示，2025 年巴西汽车出口的增长幅度将远远超过此前的预期。【原文：Brazil's auto exports are set to grow much more than previously expected in 2025, automakers' association Anfavea said on Thursday, crediting strong demand from neighboring Argentina for the upward revision to its forecast.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，通用汽车将从 CATL 进口电动汽车电池
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，通用汽车将从中国电池巨头 CATL 进口电动汽车电池。【原文：General Motors will import electric vehicle batteries from Chinese battery giant CATL , The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示花旗集团聘请摩根大通的贝加尔担任并购部门联席主管
item.description: 据路透社周四看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团已任命摩根大通的吉列尔莫-巴伊瓜尔（Guillermo Baygual）为并购部门联席主管，因为这家美国银行正努力扩大其在利润丰厚的交易业务中的份额。【原文：Citigroup has appointed JPMorgan Chase's Guillermo Baygual as co-head of mergers and acquisitions, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Thursday, as the U.S. bank seeks to grow its share of the lucrative dealmaking business.】

item.title: 在人工智能产业寻求投资回报之际，OpenAI 推出 GPT-5
item.description: OpenAI 周四发布了其 GPT-5 人工智能模型，这是一项帮助改变全球商业和文化的技术的最新成果，备受期待。【原文：OpenAI launched on Thursday its GPT-5 artificial intelligence model, the highly anticipated latest installment of a technology that has helped transform global business and culture.】

item.title: 尽管作物价格低廉，但 Nutrien 预计农民将使用更多化肥
item.description: 世界顶级钾肥生产商 Nutrien 公司高管周四对分析师表示，尽管部分作物价格处于多年低位，但该公司预计今年秋季北美农民将增加化肥使用量，2026 年全球钾肥市场将保持良好态势。【原文：Nutrien , the world's top potash producer, expects increased fertilizer use by North American farmers this fall and a good global potash market in 2026 despite some crop prices at multi-year lows, company executives told analysts on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道摩根大通否认因宗教原因关闭与堪萨斯州前州长有关的账户
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，摩根大通否认因宗教原因关闭了一个与堪萨斯州前州长萨姆-布朗巴克（Sam Brownback）有关联的账户，并且在关闭该账户前没有收到要求他提供的信息。【原文：JPMorgan Chase denied it closed an account linked to former Kansas Governor Sam Brownback on religious grounds, and did not receive information it requested from him before shutting the account, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国法官撤销美联储借记卡 "刷卡费 "规定，但暂停执行上诉令
item.description: 一名美国法官撤销了美联储的 "刷卡费 "规定，该规定对银行向商户收取的借记卡交易处理费用设定了上限，这一裁决有利于长期以来一直抱怨支付费用过高的零售商。【原文：A U.S. judge has vacated the Federal Reserve’s “swipe fees” regulation that capped the amount banks charge merchants for processing debit transactions, in a ruling favoring retailers that have long complained about paying inflated amounts.】

item.title: 埃里森概述了新派拉蒙的愿景，重点是内容和技术
item.description: 派拉蒙新任董事长兼首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）在一封纪念与 Skydance Media 合并完成的公开信中，概述了将这家百年娱乐公司转型为技术驱动型媒体企业的计划。【原文：Paramount's new chairman and chief executive, David Ellison, outlined a plan to transform the century-old entertainment company into a technology-driven media enterprise in an open letter marking the completion of the merger with Skydance Media.】

item.title: 制药商竞相推出首款减肥药
item.description: 由于礼来公司（Eli Lilly）的 Zepbound 和诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）的 Wegovy 越来越受欢迎，预计到 2030 年代初，整个行业的减肥药物收入将超过 1,500 亿美元。【原文：Weight-loss drugs are expected to pull in more than $150 billion in industry-wide revenue by the early 2030s, thanks to the ever-growing popularity of Eli Lilly's Zepbound and Novo Nordisk's Wegovy.】

item.title: 印度总理莫迪与巴西总统卢拉同意加强贸易和技术合作
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）和巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva）周四在一份声明中表示，双方同意加强在贸易、技术、能源、国防、农业、卫生和人文关系方面的合作。【原文：India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Brazil's President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva on Thursday agreed to enhance cooperation in trade, technology, energy, defence, agriculture, health and people-to-people ties, Modi's office said in a statement.】

item.title: 受美国经济疲软影响，宏利财报不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 加拿大宏利金融公司周四公布的季度盈利低于分析师预期，主要原因是美国信贷和死亡率损失增加，该公司股价下跌超过 3%。【原文：Canadian insurer Manulife Financial shares fell by more than 3% on Thursday after it reported quarterly earnings below analysts' estimates, largely due to elevated credit and mortality losses in the United States.】
